];var colorIndex=Math.floor(Math.random()*colorVariations.length);colors[i]=colorVariations[colorIndex][0];colors[i+1]=colorVariations[colorIndex][1];colors[i+2]=colorVariations[colorIndex][2];}var geometry=new THREE.BufferGeometry();geometry.setAttribute('position',new THREE.BufferAttribute(positions,3));geometry.setAttribute('color',new THREE.BufferAttribute(colors,3));var material=new THREE.PointsMaterial({size:0.03,vertexColors:true,transparent:true,opacity:0.7,sizeAttenuation:true,blending:THREE.AdditiveBlending});var particles=new THREE.Points(geometry,material);scene.add(particles);particlesRef.current=particles;// Mouse interaction

var mouseInfluence=0.1;var dx=_positions[_i]-mouseRef.current.x*10;var dy=_positions[_i+1]-mouseRef.current.y*10;var distanceToMouse=Math.sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy);if(distanceToMouse<3){var force=(3-distanceToMouse)*mouseInfluence;_positions[_i]+=dx*force;_positions[_i+1]+=dy*force;}}particlesRef.current.geometry.attributes.position.needsUpdate=true;// Gentle rotation
